title: The.Inquisitor.Book.I.The.Plague-RELOADED
description:
nERv

The Inquisitor - Book 1: The Plague  (c) Anuman Interactive

07/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......:
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Adventure

A will of steel, a heart of stone, intelligence as sharp as a knife,
and wisdom as deep as oblivion

Eymerich is called upon to investigate an obscure case. Something that goes
way beyond heresy, revealing a new face of Evil. He must tackle a great
number of arduous tasks and make many painful choices. Terrible creatures
await him, but with his burning determination he will overcome a Plague
that is deadlier than his worst possible nightmare

- Widescreen resolutions supported
- Original character and storyline (a real bad guy
- 2 different game modes (adventure & interactive novel
- Rich 3D audio environments (Home Theater 5.1 supported
- 6 to 8 hours of gameplay
- Optional text driven input (issue commands with keyboard, for
retro-game fans
- Hidden object mechanism for high longevity try to get a complete score
of 100/100
- More than 20 different puzzles and mini-games
- Over 30 highly-detailed environments

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game.
4. Play the game
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
